# reversesTitleShadowWhenHighlighted

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the title shadow changes when the button is highlighted.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var reversesTitleShadowWhenHighlighted: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the shadow changes from engrave to emboss appearance when highlighted. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
